LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.destitute_slave: I'm a slave of a destitute group. I expect nothing.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.poor_slave_expe: I'm a slave of a poor group. I expect very little.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.meager_slave_ex: I'm a slave of a group with meager holdings. I expect little.
LanguageData.ExpectationsSlave.stages.slave_expectati: I'm a slave. I don't expect much.
